publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-477# Mary Mulligan: Whitburn Fairtrade Townâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Whitburn Fairtrade Steering Group following a year of hard work that has led to the town of Whitburn being granted Fairtrade Town status by the Fairtrade Foundation and recognises that this is a further step along the road to West Lothian becoming a Fairtrade County.

S3M-477# Whitburn Fairtrade Town (lodged on 14 September 2007) Nanette Milne*, Iain Gray*, James Kelly*, Angela Constance*, Des McNulty*, Malcolm Chisholm*, Robin Harper*, Patricia Ferguson*, Pauline McNeill*, Bill Butler*, Trish Godman*, Bill Wilson*
S3M-477# Whitburn Fairtrade Town (lodged on 14 September 2007) Jackie Baillie*, Karen Whitefield*, Karen Gillon*, David Whitton*, Elaine Murray*, Roseanna Cunningham*
S3M-477# Whitburn Fairtrade Town (lodged on 14 September 2007) Joe FitzPatrick*
S3M-477# Whitburn Fairtrade Town (lodged on 14 September 2007) Ken Macintosh*, Elaine Smith*
S3M-477# Whitburn Fairtrade Town (lodged on 14 September 2007) Cathy Peattie*
